Address: 250 OAK RIDGE RD, OAK RIDGE, New Jersey, 07438, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Lakeland Bancorp, Inc. (the "Company" or "Lakeland Bancorp") is a bank holding company headquartered in Oak Ridge, New Jersey. The Company was organized in March of 1989 and commenced operations on May 19, 1989, upon the consummation of the acquisition of all of the outstanding stock of Lakeland Bank, formerly named Lakeland State Bank ("Lakeland" or the "Bank" or "Lakeland Bank"). Lakeland currently operates 52 branch offices located throughout Bergen, Essex, Morris, Ocean, Passaic, Somerset, Sussex, and Union counties in New Jersey and in Highland Mills, New York; six New Jersey regional commercial lending centers in Bernardsville, Iselin, Jackson, Montville, Teaneck and Waldwick; and one New York commercial lending center to serve the Hudson Valley region. Lakeland offers an extensive suite of financial products and services for businesses and consumers. The Company has grown through a combination of organic growth and acquisitions.  ... More ...
